channel.title: Need help Making a tele device
channel.description: Im trying make A teleporting Device teleport u 5 placesa if u stand on middle of it can someone make it for me or give clue? Device object id = 4868 :confused: Thank You for your help :|

item.title: Need help Making a tele device
item.dc:creator: @CarScape CarScape
item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

I will try it oh didnt work read what i said u got it wrong …[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 05, 2008, 10:43:31 am[/size][hr]oh [ seems u didnt understand wat i want…] i want if u in the right place WILL BE CHOOSE where u wana teleport … like npc talk dialogue
Like place 1 place 2 place 3 … and if your not in right place says in npcs chat stand in right place[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 05, 2008, 02:10:36 pm[/size][hr]Please Help me OuT!

item.title: Need help Making a tele device
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

ok umm if you looking to have it so you tele if you are in it you will need a code that tells it

if (playerIsIn = …)

then just get your coords and under it make it so idk umm

if (playerIsIn = …) {
teleportToX = xCoords;
teleportToY = yCoords;

this is only s rough code not the right one i did this in like 5 secs NOT THE RIGHT CODE
